text: Richard Gordon Hatcher (July 10, 1933 â€“ December 13, 2019) was an American Democratic politician and lawyer. He was the first African-American Mayor of Gary, Indiana for 20 years, from 1968 to 1988. Hatcher also was vice-chairman of the Democratic National Committee in the early 1980s. He was born in Michigan City, Indiana. Hatcher died at the Mercy Hospital and Medical Center in Chicago on December 13, 2019 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2019 deaths Category:African-American politicians Category:American mayors Category:Lawyers from Indiana Category:Politicians from Indiana Category:Politicians from Chicago Category:People from Gary, Indiana Category:People from Michigan City, Indiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Lawyers from Chicago
